title: append(nil, slice) is illegal
body:
one of the use cases in the original proposal posted
on golang-nuts was this:

- making a copy of a slice:
	copy = append(nil, slice)

this does not currently work - the compiler gives this error:

/Users/rog/src/tst.go:4: first argument to append must be slice; have nil

6g, darwin, 71a9509287b2+ tip
